mapper.select: SELECT FAQ_NO, FAQ_TITLE, FAQ_CONTENT, ADMIN_ID, FAQ_REWRITER, FAQ_DATE, FAQ_REDATE FROM FAQ ORDER BY FAQ_REDATE DESC

SELECT * FROM FAQ
WHERE FAQ_TITLE LIKE '%'|| #{searchBox} ||'%' WHERE ADMIN_ID LIKE '%'|| #{searchBox} ||'%' WHERE FAQ_CONTENT LIKE '%'|| #{searchBox} ||'%'
ORDER BY FAQ_DATE DESC

SELECT FAQ_NO, FAQ_TITLE, FAQ_CONTENT, ADMIN_ID, FAQ_REWRITER, FAQ_DATE, FAQ_REDATE FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS N, FAQ_NO, FAQ_TITLE, FAQ_CONTENT, ADMIN_ID, FAQ_REWRITER, FAQ_DATE, FAQ_REDATE FROM FAQ
WHERE FAQ_TITLE LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' WHERE ADMIN_ID LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' WHERE FAQ_CONTENT LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%'
ORDER BY FAQ_REDATE DESC ) WHERE N BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY FAQ_REDATE ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FAQ
WHERE FAQ_TITLE LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' WHERE ADMIN_ID LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%' WHERE FAQ_CONTENT LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%'
